Uses of Package
de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.network

Packages that use de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.network
de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.analyzer Interfaces required to receive and process the state of the simulation. 
de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.common Defines interfaces and final object common for all layers and components. 
de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.network Provides interfaces necessary to implement the network layer and all its subcomponents such as the used latency model or a specific subnet implementation. 
de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.transport Interfaces specific to the transport layer. 
de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.analyzer Provides analyzers used to measure the simulated components. 
de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.common Provides default implementations for hosts, properties and monitors. 
de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.network Package where different network implementations are located. 
de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.network.gnp   
de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.network.gnp.topology   
de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.network.simple Implementation of the simple network, which does not rely on a topology. 
de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.transport This layer encapsulates the details of the underlying network corresponding to layer four in the ISO/OSI model 
de.tud.kom.p2psim.util   
uc3m.netcom.peerfactsim.api.network   
uc3m.netcom.peerfactsim.impl.network.simple   
 

Classes in de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.network used by de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.analyzer
NetID
          Represents an abstract address of a host in the network.
NetMessage
          NetMessages are used to realise the communication between two NetLayers and encapsulate the necessary information such as the used network protocol and the NetID of the sender and receiver of a given message.
 

Classes in de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.network used by de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.common
NetID
          Represents an abstract address of a host in the network.
NetLayer
          The NetLayer provides a general interface to encapsulate various networking models.
NetMessage
          NetMessages are used to realise the communication between two NetLayers and encapsulate the necessary information such as the used network protocol and the NetID of the sender and receiver of a given message.
NetPosition
          Abstract position of a peer in the space.
 

Classes in de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.network used by de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.network
NetID
          Represents an abstract address of a host in the network.
NetLayer
          The NetLayer provides a general interface to encapsulate various networking models.
NetMessage
          NetMessages are used to realise the communication between two NetLayers and encapsulate the necessary information such as the used network protocol and the NetID of the sender and receiver of a given message.
NetMessageListener
          NetMessage listeners acts as event handlers for incoming NetMsgEvents triggered by the NetLayer.
NetMsgEvent
          NetMsgEvents comprises data necessary to implement the virtual communication between higher layers which are located above the NetLayer in the procotol stack (such as the TransLayer).
NetPosition
          Abstract position of a peer in the space.
NetProtocol
          This enum types describe the service properties chosen for message transmission at the network layer
 

Classes in de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.network used by de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.transport
NetID
          Represents an abstract address of a host in the network.
